original_text: “Six days you shall work, but on the seventh day you shall rest. In plowing time and in harvest you shall rest.
korean_text: 너는 엿새 동안 일하고 일곱째 날에는 쉴지니 밭 갈 때에나 거둘 때에도 쉴지며

sentences.original_text: but on the seventh day you shall rest.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 일곱째 날에는 네가 쉬어야 한다

sentences.original_text: In plowing time and in harvest you shall rest.
sentences.korean_translation: 밭 갈 때와 추수 때에도 너는 쉬어야 한다
